p: Results obtained from the current research were statistically processed and subjected to analysis of variance one-way ANOVA, followed by Tukey B Post Hoc multiple comparison test with a probability of p < 0.05, using statistical package for the social sciences (SPSS) version 13.0 (Prentice Hall, Chicago, IL, USA, 2004) to detect any significant difference in behavior of the tested EOs against the tested microorganisms.
